content: Death Stranding is an action game developed by Kojima Productions. The game's protagonist, Sam Porter Bridges, is a porter for an organization known as Bridges, which aims to reconnect isolated cities across the United States following a mysterious event known as the "Death Stranding" that caused supernatural creatures to appear and caused widespread death and destruction. As Sam, the player must travel across the country, delivering packages and supplies to various outposts while avoiding hostile creatures and hostile human factions. Along the way, the player uncovers a conspiracy involving a mysterious figure known as "Higgs" and a shadowy organization known as the "Ghosts." Ultimately, the player must make difficult choices that will affect the fate of humanity.
